channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Test du Xiaomi Poco F8 Pro : un rapport qualité-prix agressif qui se paye même un téléobjectif
item.description: Le Poco F8 Pro promet le meilleur des mondes : un écran OLED ultra lumineux, un Snapdragon haut de gamme et une batterie gigantesque, le tout à un prix plus doux que celui du F8 Ultra. Une recette réussie ? C’est ce que nous allons voir dans ce test.

item.title: The Gloves Are Off in the Fight for Your Right to Repair
item.description: This year, the right-to-repair movement got a boost from—surprisingly—big tech, tariffs, and economic downturn. But the companies controlling who fixes their stuff aren’t giving up that power willingly.

item.title: 2025’s Best Phones Were Also Its Wackiest
item.description: If anything, iPhones and Pixels are practically vanilla. The next generation is thinner, more transparent, and folds in half. That’s a good thing.

item.title: Giant homebuilder KB Home shifts strategy amid a housing market where it lacks pricing power
item.description: KB Home executives believe that leaning more into built-to-order will help see the company’s margins bottom in Q1 2026. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: How a $200 Fake Fireplace From Home Depot Soothed My Soul
item.description: Research shows that watching a simulated fire may have real psychological benefits.

item.title: Why Apple and Google want your ID
item.description: The push for digital passports is about more than just getting through the airport. Apple and Google would like to see your identification, please.

item.title: La dernière venue de Garmin avec son écran Amoled profite de sa première baisse de prix
item.description: La Garmin Forerunner 570se démarque avec une luminosité éclatante grâce à un écran AMOLED et chez Alltricks, elle connaît une première promo et passe de 549 euros à 519 euros.

item.title: How to watch 'The Scarecrow's Wedding' on BBC iPlayer (it's FREE)
item.description: Betty O’Barley and Harry O’Hay’s big day gets the BBC Christmas special treatment — here’s how to watch it for free wherever you are

item.title: Prominent Canadian Musician Says Gig Was Cancelled After Google AI Overview Wrongly Branded Him Sex Pest
item.description: What he describes is an ugly case of AI-generated mistaken identity.

item.title: The best Nintendo Switch 2 games for 2026
item.description: One of the best things about the Switch 2 is how familiar it feels if you have used any previous Switch console. You can still move between handheld and TV play without thinking about it, and most of your favorite games come along for the ride. Nintendo’s compatibility page highlights the rare titles with quirks, while its transfer guide helps you bring over your data so you can pick up right where you left off.Once you are set up, the Switch 2’s library opens up fast. From cozy indie adventures to sprawling open-world games and couch-co-op staples, the system has something for every kind of p...

item.title: Comment télécharger un e-book sur votre liseuse ?
item.description: Vous voilà heureux : vous venez d’acheter un e-book en ligne, et vous n’attendez qu’une chose : pouvoir le lire sur votre liseuse. Un problème néanmoins : vous ne savez pas comment transférer votre e-book depuis votre ordinateur sur votre liseuse. Pas de panique, on prend les choses en main.

item.title: ‘Wolf DNA’ Lurks in Many Modern Dog Breeds
item.description: Although wolf-canine interbreeding has been considered extremely rare, the latest research shows that many present-day canines carry a small amount of wolf genes.

item.title: Skullpandas Sanrio collab just gave me my new emotional support bag charm
item.description: Bag charms are back, emotional support accessories are everywhere, and Pop Mart's latest collab turns My Melody and Kuromi into collectible plush pendants.

item.title: If you’ve got 15 minutes, this $40 app can teach you a book’s biggest ideas
item.description: Read or listen to 15-minute summaries of the world's best nonfiction books with this lifetime subscription to Headway Premium, now only $39.99 (reg. $299.95) with code SUMMARY20, the best price on the web, until Jan. 31.

item.title: Marty Supreme review: Timothée Chalamet is racing towards his Oscar
item.description: Timothée Chalamet teams with Josh Safdie for a pulse-pounding ping-pong drama "Marty Supreme." Review.

item.title: Song Sung Blue review: Hugh Jackman and Kate Hudson face love and loss in Neil Diamond tribute-band drama
item.description: How can a movie be feel-good and tearjerker? Craig Brewer delivers both with this stanger than fiction love story.

item.title: No Other Choice review: Park Chan-wooks anti-capitalist parable skewers the job market
item.description: South Korean director Park Chan-wook delivers a biting social commentary on the brutal job market in "No Other Choice." Review.

item.title: The 41 best Apple TV shows, ranked
item.description: Not sure exactly what's on Apple's streaming service? We're here to help with our picks of the best TV shows on Apple TV+.

item.title: Top 12 productivity books of 2025 to change your relationship with work and time
item.description: These are the titles that helped people stay organized, focused, and finally finish what they started this year. Somewhere between endless meetings and half-finished projects, we all went looking for better ways to get things done this year. These are the 2025 titles that helped people stay organized, focused, and finally finish what they started.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 : nos conseils pour débuter et profiter de sa nouvelle console
item.description: Vous venez de déballer et d'allumer votre toute nouvelle Nintendo Switch 2 et vous avez envie d'avoir la meilleure expérience possible ? Voici nos conseils pour en profiter au maximum et choisir les jeux adéquats.

item.title: Steam and Valve's online games are partially down
item.description: Starting at around 1PM ET on December 24, Steam experienced an outage that impacted users ability to access the game store and play games online. Valve didn’t acknowledge the outage publicly, but SteamDB’s unofficial Steam Status page reported that the Steam Store, Steam Community, and Steam Web APIs were all offline.DownDetector received over 6,000 outage reports around 1:15PM ET, and Steam was also inaccessible from Valve’s mobile apps. The outage appears to have affected APIs for Valve’s online games, like Team Fortress 2, Dota 2 and Counterstrike 2, as well.By around 4PM ET, Steam itself h...
